Systems programming assignments (written in C language) - Each project had a deadling of 3-4 weeks. The main tasks of these assignments make deep usage of forking multiple processes, establishing communication between them with a limited buffer through named-pipes (syspro02 assignment) or tcp sockets (syspro03 assignment). Syspro03 assignment also features multi-threading.
